msbt.message:
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Not sure why someone set up
here, <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe it's some modern art thing?

<20_2 arg="10" />Seems shifty, someone leavin' out .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Why here? Some kinda art- installation thing? Maybe a practical joke? Well, I ain't fallin' for it! I'm keepin' my eye on this place for any more practical jokers.<10_4 /> Or artists.
<20_3 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Had no idea mushrooms grew so big!Hang on a second Reckon this is ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Thought I'd found a freak fungus.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Interestin' spot to leave out <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Until it melts, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wonder who it was that left here<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Obviously someone with good taste in furnishin', .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> takes me back<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What?! Don't gimme that look! I was a kiddo once, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The thing about vintage stuff like <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Is that there's gotta be a whole mess of memories etched into all of those cracks and crevices,
Can't say I was much of a student. Never really took to studyin' when I was a kiddo, So I'm not sure I get the appeal of <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />.
<20_2 arg="10" />Are we on vacation all of a sudden? If not, why'd someone set up <20_2 arg="9" /> here? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Suddenly feels like a resort, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Funny place to set up <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Is someone doin' their pencil pushin' outdoors, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Y'know, the rugged look of just fits here<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Guess that makes me perfect for the great outdoors too, since I got such rugged good looks and all. Gahaha!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Guess there are worse things than <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But this ain't my thing, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Guess someone ain't worried
will attract bugs.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Reckon I got lured in before the bugs did, though. Gahaha!
<20_2 arg="10" />This feels like some kinda drive-in restaurant, since there's <20_2 arg="9" /> here. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now I wanna put in an order for fries and a root beer float, .
Wonder if someone meant this to feel kinda like a playground, with <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Look what washed up here !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />A rare find for any beachcombin' enthusiast, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Dunno that I'd be able to move like this.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Not with my back,
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Gotta tell ya, every time I see <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Takes me right back to the Bunny Days of yesteryear, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, wow The childhood memories just come floodin' back when I see <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />, I should give my mom a call one of these days.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa. Makes you think. Did
fall outta space and land here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Nah. Stuff burns up in the atmosphere, right? So it couldn't be that So it must be an alien's ! Think it's radioactive? Gahaha!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa, who's gettin' hitched? 'Cause we got here!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Waitis it me? Did I forget my own wedding AGAIN?! <10_4 />No, that was just a dreamI think

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I just can't help gettin' wistful for sea voyages and the like when I stare at .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But what can I say about the sea that ain't been said by a thousand lousy poetsand maybe two good ones?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I just start grinnin' every time I see our .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />There's just something magical about havin' a piece of the night sky right here on .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My imagination gets all caught up in adventure when I lay eyes on there.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Crossing oceans and swords, salt spray stinging your eyes Doesn't it all sound exhaustin', ?

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I can't help thinkin' of fall when I see .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />One glance and my noggin gets full up with thoughts of chilly nights and leaves piled up high, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Everyone used to own these when I was little. I was utterly convinced ours was haunted though.There'd always be spooky noises if you ever got near. Turned out it was just wasps, ! Gahaha!

<20_2 arg="10" />Awww, wouldja look at that!<20_2 arg="9" /> !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That takes me WAY back to when I was just a little , stackin' those things up as high as I could. Yeah, I know that's not how you play with that kinda toy. I was a weird kid.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Someone went an' snazzed up this part of the island with . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Looks good there, but now I'm hungry for a Turkey Day feast, .
